department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt has a need for a large fabric storage tent. The tender is FOR cancelled.
description:
The Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt (CFB Esquimalt) Base Logistics (BLog) has a requirement for the supply and installation of one (1) 668.9 m2 Fabric Storage Tent for the covered storage of national assets.
Please refer to attached document for full details and security requirements. As per the normal tendering process, please attend by 2024-07-15. Not a Request for Single Proposal.
tags: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Contract Title: 
Fabric Storage Tent for Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt
### Brief Description: 
The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is seeking proposals for the supply and installation of a Fabric Storage Tent at Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt.

### Contract Details
* Contract Number: WS4278060053
* Solicitation Number: WS4278060053
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-03-08 14:00:00
* Contract Period: 2024-07-12
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Variations or combinations of the above methods

### Important Dates
* Amendment Date: 2024-03-05
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-03-08 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Award Date: To be determined
* Expected Contract Start Date: To be determined
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-07-12

### Contact Information
* Darlene Thorne, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Email: [darlene.thorne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:darlene.thorne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone: N/A
* Contact Fax: N/A
* Notice URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18545097?extsite=MTg1NDUwOTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18545097?extsite=MTg1NDUwOTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### End User: 
* Department of National Defence (DND)
* End User Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A0K2, Canada

### Notes:
* Security Requirements Check List (SRCL) attached to this requirement.
* All deliverables must be received on or before 2024-07-15.
